Last Published: 2017-12-14  | Version: 1.0.20171215014315

Plugin Documentation

Goals available for this plugin:

Goal Description
scalor:auto-conf Discover and inject maven project properties for use by other executions. Generated properties look like: [scalor.autoconfSomeName]. Interpolated parameters look like: [scalor.othermoduleSomeName]. Interpolated parameters are collected from all scalor plugin executions.
scalor:compile-macro Compile Scala sources in compilation scope=macro.
scalor:compile-main Compile Java and Scala sources in compilation scope=main.
scalor:compile-test Compile Java and Scala sources in compilation scope=test.
scalor:eclipse-classpath Provision and configure Eclipse .classpath file.
scalor:eclipse-project Provision and configure Eclipse .project file.
scalor:eclipse-settings Provision and configure Eclipse .settings/ folder.
scalor:link-scala-js-main Generate Scala.js runtime JavaScript for scope=main.
scalor:link-scala-js-test Generate Scala.js runtime JavaScript for scope=test.
scalor:prepack-linker-main Prepare linker build resources for packaging for compilation scope=main.
scalor:prepack-linker-test Prepare linker build resources for packaging for compilation scope=test.
scalor:prepack-macro Prepare build resources for packaging for compilation scope=macro.
scalor:prepack-main Prepare build resources for packaging for compilation scope=main.
scalor:prepack-test Prepare build resources for packaging for compilation scope=test.
scalor:register-macro Register project sources for compilation scope=macro.
scalor:register-main Register project sources for compilation scope=main.
scalor:register-test Register project sources for compilation scope=test.

System Requirements

The following specifies the minimum requirements to run this Maven plugin:

Maven 2.0
JDK 1.8
Memory No minimum requirement.
Disk Space No minimum requirement.

Usage

You should specify the version in your project's plugin configuration:

<project>
  ...
  <build>
    <!-- To define the plugin version in your parent POM -->
    <pluginManagement>
      <plugins>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>com.carrotgarden.maven</groupId>
          <artifactId>scalor-maven-plugin_2.12</artifactId>
          <version>1.0.20171215014228</version>
        </plugin>
        ...
      </plugins>
    </pluginManagement>
    <!-- To use the plugin goals in your POM or parent POM -->
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>com.carrotgarden.maven</groupId>
        <artifactId>scalor-maven-plugin_2.12</artifactId>
        <version>1.0.20171215014228</version>
      </plugin>
      ...
    </plugins>
  </build>
  ...
</project>

For more information, see "Guide to Configuring Plug-ins"
